entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Process does not redirect all output. #76153
  • Group By Lazy #76152
  • FOH (Frozen Object Heap) work items #76151
    8.0.0
  • FileCheck error: '__jit_disasm.out' is empty for outerloop tests #76150
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for custom JSON deserialization error messages to System.Text.Json #76149
  • Get "/azp run" working again for external contributors #76147

Closed

  • .NET Logging after IHost Shutdown #76084
  • [API Proposal]: add StartTime property, or the elapsed time seconds method, to per thread. #76145
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #66010
    Future
  • string.IndexOf() incorrect return value for full stop for Thai culture #76137
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #41516
    Future
  • Mono interpreter crashing when calling constructor with 1000 parameters #76093
    8.0.0
  • What is the correct GC generation for static string field in Net6? #68544
    Future
  • Combine IL ranges when folding Basic Blocks #49471
    Future
  • Сhunk method Linq #76148
  • List<> should use faster write barriers #76104
  • [API Proposal]: Non static variants of IMultiplicativeIdentity and IAdditiveIdentity #76132

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache KeySizes array for EC types #76156
    area-System.Security
  • Process primitives in local morph #76155
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable System.IO.FileSystem tests for native aot #76146
    area-System.IO
  • Improve vectorization of Enumerable.Min/Max #76144
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Remove redundant tmp check #76154
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve List<T>.AddRange performance for enumerables #76043
    area-System.Collections
  • Update il range in optOptimizeBoolsUpdateTrees #74657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disable frequently failing CriticalFinalizer test #76131
  • JIT: refactor jump threading a bit #76108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Remove WeakReference.m_trackResurrection field #76115
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't use write barriers for frozen objects #76135
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System/System.Numerics #76103
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Add IR support for modeling multiple SSA definitions as one store #76139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • [Bug] Fix issue #70227 #76143
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some math helpers in DecimalCalc #76118
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ConfigureKestrel Called During WebApplicationBuilder.Build in 6.0.9 #43993
  • SignalR guaranteed message delivery #42874
    Discussions

Updated

  • Write custom authentication failure information to the response body #44100
  • Add support for flowing the Activity/distributed trace context via SignalR invocations #18711
    Backlog
  • jsRuntime.InvokeAsync can't return null as Nullable<Guid> #30366
    Backlog
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-38013: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #43953
    Discussions
  • Consider updating the static file middleware to return cache-control: no-cache in Development #44153
  • ContentRangeHeaderValue "to" must always be less than "length" #44166
  • .NET 7 RC1 ASP.Net Core Output Caching: Memory leak in MemoryOutputCacheStore? #44169

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44174
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Use Ubuntu 20.04 a bit more #44173
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 20.04 a bit more #44172
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add loc comments and fix Windows installer bug #44170
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44152
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44135
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2003463 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • fix dotnet#43523 HttpSys Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #44144
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Translate aggregate functions without GroupBy #29200
  • Attempting GroupBy navigation property throws internal KeyNotFoundException #29199

Closed

  • The entity type requires a primary key to be defined. If you intended to use a keyless entity type, call 'HasNoKey' in 'OnModelCreating'. #29198
